alert.note: Alert for Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Poinsett and northeastern Cross Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harrisburg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Cherry Valley, Fisher, Wiley Crossing, Birdeye, Landers, Supply, Weona Junction, Weona, Stewart, Colton, Boat Run, Bay Village, Coldwater, Whitaker, Old Weona, Monterey and Lake Poinsett State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
